title: Oil prices hit six-month highs after Trump warns Iran of 'bad things' if there's no deal
summary_full: U.S. President Donald Trump has given Iran "10 to 15" days to make a meaningful deal over its nuclear program — or “really bad things” will happen.
summary_public: U.S. President Donald Trump has given Iran "10 to 15" days to make a meaningful deal over its nuclear program — or “really bad things” will happen.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: warns Iran of 'bad things' if there's no deal
